video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, noble
video.title: How To Do a Noble Pose
video.description: You might recognize the Noble Pose as the dreaded "sit-and-reach" from your childhood gym class. But while that was an exercise in pre-pubescent humiliation, this is a time-honored and well-respected yoga posture. See the difference?
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=233"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=233" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

ingredients.ingredient: Comfortable clothing suitable for stretching and moving
A calm place where you won't be distracted or disturbed
A yoga mat or folded blanket

marker.title: Sit down on mat
marker.textile-text: Sit down on the mat with your legs straight out in front of you.
marker.text: Sit down on the mat with your legs straight out in front of you.

marker.title: Raise arms
marker.textile-text: Inhale, and raise your arms up overhead.
marker.text: Inhale, and raise your arms up overhead.

marker.title: Bend forward
marker.textile-text: Exhale, and bend forward from the hips, lowering your torso and outstretched arms parallel to your legs.
marker.text: Exhale, and bend forward from the hips, lowering your torso and outstretched arms parallel to your legs.

marker.textile-text: It's okay to slightly bend at the knees while extending into this pose.
marker.text: It’s okay to slightly bend at the knees while extending into this pose.

marker.title: Lower chest & grab feet
marker.textile-text: Bring your chest to your thighs and your face to your shins while reaching for and grabbing hold of your feet. Keep your back as straight as possible.
marker.text: Bring your chest to your thighs and your face to your shins while reaching for and grabbing hold of your feet. Keep your back as straight as possible.

marker.textile-text: If you can't reach your feet, loop a belt or a strap around them to grab onto.
marker.text: If you can’t reach your feet, loop a belt or a strap around them to grab onto.

marker.title: Hold pose
marker.textile-text: Hold the pose for 5 to 10 breaths, or longer if you can.
marker.text: Hold the pose for 5 to 10 breaths, or longer if you can.

marker.title: Release pose
marker.textile-text: To release the pose, inhale, and raise your torso straight up with your arms stretched overhead, then exhale and lower your hands to the floor. Now to conquer kickball...
marker.text: To release the pose, inhale, and raise your torso straight up with your arms stretched overhead, then exhale and lower your hands to the floor. Now to conquer kickball…

marker.textile-text: Pop nobility Sting recently admitted that he and his wife's claims of yoga-inspired marathons of tantric sex was all a joke, saying, "I have frantic sex, not tantric sex."
marker.text: Pop nobility Sting recently admitted that he and his wife’s claims of yoga-inspired marathons of tantric sex was all a joke, saying, “I have frantic sex, not tantric sex.”

video.title: How To Do the Extended Triangle Pose
video.description: What do paintings on a wall, car tires, and promising horoscopes have in common? They all require proper alignment. It's not the easiest skill to acquire, but the Extended Triangle Pose will help hone it.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=224"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=224" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, extended, triangle, utthita, trikonasana, warrior

video.title: How To Do a Seated Spinal Twist Pose
video.description: According to Hindu mythology, this pose was originated by a yogi who spent 12 years in the belly of a fish, eavesdropping on Shiva's secret yoga instructions in an ocean cave. All you have to do is sit on a mat.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=225"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=225" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, seated, spinal, twist, Ardha, Matsyendrasana

video.title: How To Do the Chair Pose
video.description: Remember how there was always one joker in school who pretended to sit on an invisible chair? That joker might just make an excellent yoga practitioner.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=226"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=226" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, chair

video.title: How To Do the Cobra Pose
video.description: Cobras are known for achieving a menacing pose by expanding their hoods when threatened. You don't need a hood—or a threat—to strike a cobra pose. Just expand your chest.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=227"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=227" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, cobra

video.title: How To Do the Headstand Pose
video.description: Learn how to do the headstand pose correctly with these instructions.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=228"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=228" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

video.title: How To Do the Lunge Pose
video.description: The Lunge Pose will have you looking like a sprinter in the blocks, ready to take off. And after practicing it to build your lower body strength and stamina, you will be.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=229"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=229" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

video.title: How To Do the Four Limbed Staff Pose
video.description: Eventually, your calm and peaceful mind will relish the challenge that this pose presents your wrists and abdominal muscles. Until then, just be thankful it's not a one-limbed pose.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=230"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=230" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

video.title: How To Do the Eagle Pose
video.description: You won't actually be able to fly in this pose, but you will improve your balance, strengthen your legs, and stretch your hips and shoulders.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=231"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=231" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, eagle, Garudasana

video.title: How To Do the Bound Angle Pose
video.description: This relatively simple pose might make you feel like a kid stretching before gym class, but that's not necessarily a bad thing—the more you do it, the better you can gauge your maturing yoga skills.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=232"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=232" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

video.title: How To Do the Wide Legged Forward Bend
video.description: This is a variation of the Wide Legged Seated Forward Bend, but since you're standing for this one, you have a helpful partner — gravity.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=234"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=234" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: health, fitness, stretch, exercise, yoga, technique, poses, positions, wide legged forward bend, relaxation, stress, calm

video.title: How To Do the Shooting Bow Pose
video.description: This pose is exactly as it sounds—you'll be drawing back an imaginary arrow. We don't want to spoil the surprise, but you already have all the equipment built-in.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=235"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=235" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

video.title: How To Do the Plow Pose
video.description: The Plow Pose is essentially a Noble Pose turned on its head—or rather, turned on your head.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=236"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=236" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>

video.title: How To Do the Lion Pose
video.description: The Lion's Pose gives the muscles of the jaw, throat, eyes, and face a stretch that can ease problems like teeth grinding and clenched jaws. It's also excellent preparation for a KISS concert.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=237"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=237" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: DIY, Instructional, tutorial, Do It Yourself, Tips, Essential Skills, Learn to, yoga, pose, position, body, exercise, stretch, meditation, lion, simhasana

video.title: How To Do the Warrior III Pose
video.description: The Warrior III Pose recreates the moment that the fierce Virabhadra chopped off the head of his master's enemy. If you could do battle balanced on one leg, maybe you'd have a pose named after you.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=238"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=238" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
video.tags: yoga, health, mind, body, flexibility, balance, warrior, pose, technique, stretch

video.title: How To Do the Extended Side Angle Pose
video.description: You could become a flight attendant and cram luggage into those overhead storage bins to get a good torso stretch. But we think the Extended Side Angle Pose is a little more practical.
video.embed: <object width="425" height="352" classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" id="howcastplayer"><param name="movie" value="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=239"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.howcast.com/flash/howcast_player.swf?file=239" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="352" allowFullScreen="true" allowScriptAccess="always" ></embed></object>
